title: Golden Star Balm (Cao Sao Vang) 4g/0.14 Oz
features: Bracing blend of aromatic essential oils

description: An age-old Vietnamese formula, Golden Star balm is now available in a convenient 4 gram tin! Featuring a rare blend of vegetable and essential oils, this balm fits perfectly in any handbag, pocket or desk drawer and has been used for its soothing traditional Vietnamese formula for years.
